alert.note: Alert for NCC000 (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued January 14 at 9:57PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...EAS CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY... THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF FL. THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION....THE DURHAM POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR ANDRAKE ZACHARIAH PAULK. ANDRAKE PAULK IS A 9 YEAR-OLD BLACK MALE APPROXIMATELY 4 FEET TALL WEIGHING 65 POUNDS. HE HAS BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. ANDRAKE PAULK WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A WHITE SHIRT AND DARK COLORED PANTS. THE ABDUCTOR TADAISA GEORGIA-ANN PAULK IS DESCRIBED AS AN 18 YEAR-OLD BLACK FEMALE APPROXIMATELY 5 FEET 7 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 235 POUNDS. SHE HAS LONG BRAIDED ORANGE AND BLONDE HAIR. TADAISA PAULK WAS LAST SEEN WEARING AN ORANGE SWEATER. THEY WERE LAST SEEN TRAVELING NORTHBOUND ON LAWNDALE AVENUE IN DURHAM NC IN A WHITE 2020 NISSAN ALTIMA WITH NORTH CAROLINA REGISTRATION OF HJK-3628. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION CALL DURHAM POLICE DEPARTMENT IMMEDIATELY AT 919-560-4600 OR CALL 911. ACTIVATE CMAS IN REGION 6
